mapper.select: select flight_fln.id, flight_id, callsign, flight_fln.acf_type, reg, dep_addr, arr_addr, yetd, yeta, etd, eta, atd, ata, dep_gate_id, arr_gate_id, org_timezone, dst_timezone, insert_time, new_version, update_time, flight_state, update_reg , dep.longitude as dep_longitude, dep.latitude as dep_latitude, arr.longitude as arr_longitude, arr.latitude as arr_latitude,type.passenger_number FROM flight_fln left join airport dep on flight_fln.dep_addr = dep.identifier left join airport arr on flight_fln.arr_addr = arr.identifier left join aircraft_type type on flight_fln.acf_type = type.acf_type
mapper.update:
